Florian Hartmann

I work on machine learning at Google AI. Previously, I wrote my master's thesis on Federated Learning and spent a few wonderful months at Mozilla working on a Firefox implementation. Prior to that, I also worked on Differential Privacy and recommender systems at Mozilla, and on NLP at Amazon.

I occasionally like to develop apps, such as a clipboard manager or a Hacker News client. Before I got into machine learning, I published several popular JavaScript libraries.

    Bloom Filters
